system.description: Put out the word that you want a thing — could be a person, could be somethin somethin, could even be just a thing — and roll+hot.

failure.label: Complications
failure.value: On a miss, it shows up in your establishment for you with strings wicked attached.

partial.label: Partial Success
partial.value: On a 7-9, well, your people make an effort and everybody wants to please you and close is close, right?

success.label: Success
success.value: On a 10+, it shows up in your establishment for you, like magic.
